title: George Floyd and Books on Policing, Justice, and Civil Rights
author: Collin Hansen

description: Originally released on June 2nd, 2020, Kevin DeYoung, Collin Hansen, and Justin Taylor discuss George Floyd, the need for leaders with character, and books they recommend related to policing, justice, and civil rights.
